vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.32;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I) and Zecher (H2144);
father of: Shimeah (H8039)
§ Mikloth = "staves"
1) one of the sons of Jehiel, the father or prince of Gibeon by his wife Maachah; a Benjamite
2) leader of the 2nd division of David's army
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   oficial; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米基羅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "棍棒"
1) 便雅憫人, 耶利的眾子之一, 耶利是基遍的父親或基遍城的建立者, 耶利的妻子是瑪迦
2) 大衛軍隊第二班的首領 (代上 27:4)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米基罗 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "棍棒"
1) 便雅悯人, 耶利的众子之一, 耶利是基遍的父亲或基遍城的建立者, 耶利的妻子是玛迦
2) 大卫军队第二班的首领 (代上 27:4)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.4
§ Mikloth = "staves"
1) one of the sons of Jehiel, the father or prince of Gibeon by his wife Maachah; a Benjamite
2) leader of the 2nd division of David's army
